Statute.Title: Criminal Code and the Identification of Criminals Act and to make related amendments to other Acts (COVID-19 Response and other measures), An Act to amend the
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Code criminel et la Loi sur l’identification des criminels et apportant des modifications connexes à d’autres lois (réponse à la COVID-19 et autres mesures), Loi modifiant le)

General.Text: Independent Review, 2022, c. 17, s. 78.1(1) (no later than 15.12.2025)
Reports on review to be laid before each House of Parliament, 2022, c. 17, s. 78.1(2)
Review of provisions, 2022, c. 17, s. 78.2 (at the start of the fifth year after 15.12.2022)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2022, c. 17, (assent: 15.12.2022), ss. 76 to 78.2 in force on the 30th day after the day on which the Act receives royal assent see s. 79
